template.css: body { font-family: {{branding.bodyFont}}; margin: 0; padding: 20px; color: #333; } header { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: flex-start; border-bottom: 3px solid {{branding.primaryColour}}; padding-bottom: 20px; margin-bottom: 30px; } .company-name { font-family: {{branding.headingFont}}; font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; color: {{branding.primaryColour}}; } .tagline { font-size: 12px; color: #666; } h1 { font-family: {{branding.headingFont}}; color: {{branding.primaryColour}}; margin: 0; } .bill-to { background: {{branding.secondaryColour}}; padding: 15px; border-radius: 4px; margin-bottom: 30px; } table.line-items { width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; } table.line-items th { background: {{branding.primaryColour}}; color: white; padding: 10px; text-align: left; } table.line-items td { padding: 8px 10px; border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd; } table.line-items tfoot td { border-top: 2px solid {{branding.primaryColour}}; font-size: 16px; } footer { margin-top: 40px; font-size: 11px; color: #999; text-align: center; border-top: 1px solid #ddd; padding-top: 10px; }
